text: The 2007–08 Chicago Blackhawks season is the team's 81st season in the National Hockey League (NHL). == Regular season == ==Playoffs== The Blackhawks did not qualify for the playoffs in the 2007-08 seasion. ==References== Category:2007 in ice hockey Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2000s in Chicago Category:2007 in Illinois Category:2008 in Illinois
title: 2007–08 Chicago Blackhawks season
